informationBox.title: Welcome to my portfolio
informationBox.resume: I'm a back-end developer who enjoys constant learning and create innovative applications.
informationBox.invitation: If you are interested, you can find more information below.

gameJam.description: Intensive development for a 2D video game over the course of 3 days, it was our first time participating in this kind of challenge.

rickAndMorty.description: A project you can find a list of characters from the series Rick and Morty.

portfolio.description: My portfolio, where i show my projects and skills, it's responsive and has internacionalization.

loginRegisterSystem.name: Login/register system
loginRegisterSystem.description: A service of register and login, where you can create an account and log in with it.

trackMyFix.name: Track My Fix
trackMyFix.description: A web application that allows you to track your device repairs, from the moment you request a repair until it is delivered to you.

foodieScan.name: Foodie Scan
foodieScan.description: A web application that allows you to create a menu for your restaurant, where you can add dishes, drinks, and desserts, and then share it with your customers.

pipi-cucu.name: Pipi Cucu
pipi-cucu.description: A web application for a client which allows you to track the orders of your restaurant, with a user-friendly interface and real-time updates.

colectivar.name: ColectivAR
colectivar.description: A web application that allows you to track in real time the location of a bus in the city of Buenos Aires, Argentina. It uses the official API of the city to get the data and display it on a map.

english.toolsLearned: Reading and use of English, Speaking.
